DOCNAME: CASE OF ASLAN AND DEMİR v. TURKEY
CONCLUSION: Violation of Article 6 - Right to a fair trial
JUDGES: Françoise Tulkens;Ireneu Cabral Barreto;Nona Tsotsoria;Vladimiro Zagrebelsky
TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicants were born in DATE and DATE respectively and live in GPE . The facts common to these cases are that the applicants were arrested and placed in custody in different times and places . During their custody period , they were interrogated by the police , the public prosecutor and the investigating judge respectively , in the absence of a lawyer . These statements were subsequently used for their convictions by the trial court .
